data.title: Friendly local coffee house
data.text: We enjoy the environment at LoCo Artisan. They have artwork from local artist on display. The snacks are good and coffee and lattes are excellent.

data.title: Not sure how they're staying in business, but we like them
data.text:
This location, just across from the Loveland DMV is not well marked, which means it's usually pretty slow (and quiet which is great). The staff frequently is sitting at a table reading or working on something until a customer comes through to order something (however, they're always nice and helpful). 
The coffee is good and the non-coffee drinks are creative and tasty. 
The internet is pretty good and there is aways a nice table to sit at and interesting art on the walls. There is also frequently homeless clientele coming and going, which is sometimes a little unnerving, but I've never been more than pestered by someone being overly friendly. 
While it's not somewhere I'd regularly take clients, I visit fairly frequently to study, ready, or talk with friends knowing that I'll have wifi and quiet. :)

data.title: Nice roast
data.text: Nice roast; plain décor.  Having a good espresso is more important than the space you sit in to drink it; however, ownership should take a hard look at renovating their shop.  That said; the espresso was solid and the service was good.  Location was perfect for me, as we were staying in a VBRO a couple of blocks away.

data.title: Great Place for Meetings
data.text: I have been there a few times.  As coffee shops go it's OK.  My wife is always meeting people there for business and for her it the go-to place for that sort of thing particularly since it's easy walking distance from our house.

data.title: Great environment and coffee!
data.text: Stumbled upon this coffee shop. Cozy, quaint, and great coffee. The staff was friendly, helpful, and accommodating, nonetheless was informative on the delicious treats to pair with my preferred coffee.

data.title: Exceptional Coffee, and service to match!
data.text:
If you are looking for an exceptional cup of coffee...this is a must stop while in Loveland.  We are fortunate to have multiple coffeehouses to choose from in Loveland, and all are really very good, but LoCo Artisan is one of my favorites.

Service is excellent, and the coffee is soulful, best way to describe it.  Coffee is made with love and great attention to ensure you have high quality roasted beans, and there is an evident passion for brewing in this place.  Your cup of Joe will not disappoint. 

Great area for meetings, as it does have a side room, and a nice, large seating area if there solo or w/friends. 

Highly recommend.

data.title: Pay it forward coffeehouse
data.text: About the nicest folks in town, they offer great pastries from Agnes and good coffee.  They have a pay as you can coffee cup, refreshing in the current "profit is king" mindset of most places, and opposite of the new downtown Loveland mentality that poor people do not belong in downtown.

data.title: Simply the best locally roasted coffee!!
data.text: Great coffee shop located in downtown Loveland, Colorado. All the coffee is fresh roasted by the owner and available for purchase. The shop features work by local artists and is also available for purchase. The staff is wonderful. This is popular with the locals. There is a meeting room available as well. A most wonderful and magical place to start your day or a mid-dat get away!
